message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.DC, cs.CR, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with the design of erasure-correcting codes, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT). The use of disjoint groups and local redundant symbols suggests a connection to distributed storage systems (cs.DS) and distributed computing (cs.DC). The consideration of the size of the finite field is a common concern in coding theory (cs.CR) and algebraic coding theory (cs.CC).
